overview:
Data collector on Indian Book Industry & Colleges. Bookhibooks.com and bookshibooks.in are the sites owned by Print Pedia located at 4829/24, Ansari Road, Prahlad Lane, Darya Ganj, New Delhi 110002. Print Pedia is new concern but promoted and managed by the people who are in Book Industry from the last 25 years. We have experience of Publishing, Bookselling, Wholeselling, Data-collection, Export, Import & Distribution. You can find us at Facebook & Twitter too by typing bookshibooks for current updations and listings.

Bookhibooks.com is unique first B2B books site. There are 100’s of individual publishers’ and online books marketing sites but we are different from them. Its different from others run of the mill sites in many ways, which you will experience when it is fully loaded with features in times to come.

It is going to cater to all booksellers, library suppliers, and retailers etc. who are doing great service to the nation by making available latest and other books on demand to research scholars’, libraries, institutes & colleges etc which are promoting education and making society more literate and ready to compete with the world.
